subject: full refund for non-delivery
description_text: I need a refund for 3 quick releases that were never delivered. SSN3540 AND SSN3336  Your company did not deliver 3 of these quick releases and you have not communicated with me. I need a full refund immediately for all 3 plus shipping charges. I do not want promises I need a refund. I've been waiting 2 months and I've been promised several times it was coming the next day.

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 8712 中
